history.proof: unfold locks_correct_locked in *. simpl. destruct p as [s d b]. intros HLocked. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros sigma st' p Hlock Hqueue c HatHead.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (p : packet), locks_correct_locked sigma p -> (forall c : Client_index, at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') c) -> locks_correct_locked (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') p

Premises:
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [num_Clients : nat |- Type] ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- Type]
locks_correct_locked = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => pBody p = Locked -> exists c : Client_index, valid_locked (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments locks_correct_locked _%function_scope
Inductive Name : Type := Client : Client_index -> Name | Server : Name
Client_index = fin num_Clients : Type
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
at_head_of_queue = fun (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) => exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = c :: t : (Name -> Data) -> Client_index -> Prop Arguments at_head_of_queue _%function_scope
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : name; pDst : name; pBody : msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
locks_correct_unlock_at_head_preserved : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (p : packet), locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> (forall c : Client_index, at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') c) -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') p
locks_correct_at_head_preserved : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data), locks_correct sigma -> (forall c : Client_index, at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') c) -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st')
snoc_at_head_of_queue_preserved : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (st' : Data) (x : Client_index), queue st' = queue (sigma Server) ++ [x] -> forall c : Client_index, at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st') c
locks_correct_update_true : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) (st' : Data), held st' = true -> at_head_of_queue sigma c -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client c) st')
locks_correct_locked_input_handlers_old : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> locks_correct_locked (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
locks_correct_locked_at_head : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) (c : Client_index), pDst p = Client c -> pBody p = Locked -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
locked_in_flight_all_clients_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Locked -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> locks_correct sigma -> forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false
locks_correct_net_handlers : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st')
locks_correct_unlock_true_to_false : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (p : packet) (x : Client_index) (st' : Data), at_head_of_queue sigma x -> held st' = false -> pSrc p = Client x -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client x) st') p
all_clients_false_locks_correct_server_update : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (st : Data), (forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false) -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st)
locks_correct_locked_input_handlers_new : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ms -> locks_correct_locked (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
Build_Decomposition : forall (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) (state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop) (network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop) (network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop), (forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1) -> state_invariant init_handlers -> (forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')) ->...-> Decomposition B M
network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_deliver_old : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p q : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant sigma q -> network_network_invariant p q -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') q where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
Record Decomposition (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) : Type := Build_Decomposition { state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop; network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant_sym : forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1; state_invariant_init : state_invariant init_handlers; state_invariant_maintained_input : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) ->...-> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) } Arguments Build_Decomposition _ _ (_ _ _ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
locks_correct_unlock_at_head : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) (c : Client_index), pSrc p = Client c -> pBody p = Unlock -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') p' where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
locks_correct_unlock_input_handlers_old : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
locks_correct_update_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : Data) (x : Client_index), locks_correct sigma -> held st' = false -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client x) st')
locks_correct_unlock_net_handlers_old : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (q : packet), NetHandler (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct_unlock sigma q -> LockServ_network_network_invariant p q -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') q
network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ps -> pSrc p = h -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
state_invariant_maintained_deliver : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
unlock_in_flight_all_clients_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Unlock -> locks_correct_unlock sigma p -> locks_correct sigma -> forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false
locks_correct_unlock_input_handlers_new : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)) (p : packet), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ms -> pSrc p = h -> locks_correct_unlock (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p
nil_at_head_of_queue_preserved : forall (c : Client_index) (sigma sigma' : Name -> Data), queue (sigma Server) = [] -> at_head_of_queue sigma c -> at_head_of_queue sigma' c
state_invariant_maintained_input : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
locks_correct_locked_sent_lock : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Lock -> locks_correct_locked sigma p
locks_correct_locked_sent_unlock : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet), pBody p = Unlock -> locks_correct_locked sigma p
locks_correct_input_handlers : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')
at_head_of_queue_intro : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) (t : list Client_index), queue (sigma Server) = c :: t -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
at_head_of_nil : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index), at_head_of_queue sigma c -> queue (sigma Server) = [] -> False
LockServ_network_invariant = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => locks_correct_unlock sigma p /\ locks_correct_locked sigma p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments LockServ_network_invariant _%function_scope
locks_correct_true_at_head_of_queue : forall (sigma : name -> data) (x : Client_index), locks_correct sigma -> held (sigma (Client x)) = true -> at_head_of_queue sigma x
empty_queue_all_clients_false : forall sigma : name -> data, locks_correct sigma -> queue (sigma Server) = [] -> forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_old : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' q : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant sigma q -> network_network_invariant p q -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_network_invariant p' q where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = h -> network_network_invariant p p' where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
Name_rec : forall P : Name -> Set, (forall c : Client_index, P (Client c)) -> P Server -> forall n : Name, P n
Name_rect : forall P : Name -> Type, (forall c : Client_index, P (Client c)) -> P Server -> forall n : Name, P n
Name_ind : forall P : Name -> Prop, (forall c : Client_index, P (Client c)) -> P Server -> forall n : Name, P n
Name_sind : forall P : Name -> SProp, (forall c : Client_index, P (Client c)) -> P Server -> forall n : Name, P n

```  
intros sigma st' p Hlock Hqueue c HatHead.
unfold locks_correct_locked in *.
simpl in Hlock.
simpl.
destruct p as [s d b].
intros HLocked.
exists c.
rewrite <- Hqueue.
apply HatHead.
```

original: intros sigma st' p Hlock Hqueue c HatHead. unfold locks_correct_locked in *. simpl in Hlock. simpl. destruct p as [s d b]. intros HLocked. exists c. rewrite <- Hqueue. apply HatHead.
